Replace.Text: Allows the purchase of civilian units using [ICON_Faith]. Using [ICON_Gold] and [ICON_Faith] to purchase Builders, Settlers, and Merchants gives -20% cost, and halves the time it takes to build a Holy Site. Civilian units gain +2 [ICON_Movement] movement. Builders gain +1 [ICON_Charges] labor.

Mines -1 [ICON_Production] Productivity +3 [ICON_Faith] Faith. Mines with luxury resources +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture. Mines with strategic resources (even if undiscovered) +1 [ICON_Science] Technology. After unlocking the "Reformed Church" civic, mines +2 [ICON_Faith] Faith; the city gains [ICON_Culture] Culture, [ICON_Science] Technology, and [ICON_Production] Productivity equal to 20% of the Faith output each turn.

Yoshino Himegawa is a character in the light novel "Date A Live" and its derivative works. She is a beautiful blue-haired girl who looks like a French doll. She has a dreamy appearance and a petite figure. She looks about the same age as Kotori Itsuka. The second elf to appear, identified as "Hermit". She is docile and timid by nature, and almost dares not talk directly to people. The rabbit-shaped hand puppet Yoshino in her left hand is an independent personality and her best friend. She likes to be with Shido.
Replaces monument, +2 [ICON_Culture] Culture, +4 [ICON_Faith] Faith, +1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity, +1 [ICON_GreatProphet] Great Prophet point per turn.

A unique Ancient unit that replaces the Heavy Chariot. It has a faster movement speed and is more powerful than the Heavy Chariot. It gives +10 [ICON_Strength] combat strength when fighting against Barbarians.
+10 [ICON_Strength] combat strength when fighting against barbarians
